title: Gorgeous Remodeled Studio
posting_body: ['Gorgeous studio newly remodeled with laminated floors for rent.', 'Available immediately.', 'The studio for 1 person (max).', 'Including a shower bathroom.', 'A private entrance in great neighborhood.', '• Mini kitchen in unit', '• First month rent $1800 and $2,000 security deposit required to move in (so a total of $3,800 to move in)', '• The lease agreement is one year lease, and, then, month-to-month after that.', '• PG&E, water, and garbage are included.', '• Please, no pets.', '• Street parking only.', '• The studio is available now.', 'Preferred Student or working professional with a FULL-TIME job.', 'You are clean, quiet, considerate, and mindful of other people’s space.', 'Applicant should make 2.5 times the rent', 'Viewing by appointment only and MASKS are required.', 'Please email or text to schedule.']
